SEARCH
Module se1_bestellsystem
Package system

Interface Calculator

public interface Calculator
Calculator is a singleton system component that performs calculations.
Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-E12_REFACTORING"
Author:
"sgra64"

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    calculateOrderItemValue(datamodel.OrderItem item)
    Calculate value of an order item, which is calculated by: article.unitPrice * number of units ordered.
    long
    calculateOrderItemVAT(datamodel.OrderItem item)
    Calculate the included VAT of an order item calculated by the applicable tax rate and the calculated order item value.
    long
    calculateOrderValue(system.Order order)
    Calculate value of an order, which is comprised of the value of each ordered item.
    long
    calculateOrderVAT(system.Order order)
    Calculate VAT of an order, which is comprised of the VAT of each ordered item.
    long
    calculateVAT(long grossValue, datamodel.TAX taxRate)
    Calculate included VAT (Value-Added Tax) from a gross price/value based on a tax rate (VAT is called "Mehrwertsteuer" (MwSt.) in Germany).
    double
    value(datamodel.TAX taxRate)
    Return taxRate as double value, e.g.

  • Method Details

    • calculateOrderItemValue

      long calculateOrderItemValue(datamodel.OrderItem item)
      Calculate value of an order item, which is calculated by: article.unitPrice * number of units ordered.
      Parameters:
      item - to calculate value for.
      Returns:
      value of item.

    • calculateOrderItemVAT

      long calculateOrderItemVAT(datamodel.OrderItem item)
      Calculate the included VAT of an order item calculated by the applicable tax rate and the calculated order item value.
      Parameters:
      item - to calculate VAT for.
      Returns:
      VAT for ordered item.

    • calculateOrderValue

      long calculateOrderValue(system.Order order)
      Calculate value of an order, which is comprised of the value of each ordered item. The value of each item is calculated with calculateOrderItemValue(item).
      Parameters:
      order - to calculate value for.
      Returns:
      value of order.

    • calculateOrderVAT

      long calculateOrderVAT(system.Order order)
      Calculate VAT of an order, which is comprised of the VAT of each ordered item. The VAT of each item is calculated with calculateOrderItemVAT(item).
      Parameters:
      order - to calculate VAT tax for.
      Returns:
      VAT calculated for order.

    • calculateVAT

      long calculateVAT(long grossValue, datamodel.TAX taxRate)
      Calculate included VAT (Value-Added Tax) from a gross price/value based on a tax rate (VAT is called "Mehrwertsteuer" (MwSt.) in Germany).
      Parameters:
      grossValue - value that includes the tax.
      taxRate - applicable tax rate in percent.
      Returns:
      tax included in gross value.

    • value

      double value(datamodel.TAX taxRate)
      Return taxRate as double value, e.g. 19.0(%) for taxRate: TAX.GER_VAT or 7.0(%) for taxRate: TAX.GER_VAT_REDUCED.
      Parameters:
      taxRate - applicable tax rate in percent.
      Returns:
      taxRate as double value.
